summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Beacon Avenue (East Side), from Columbian Way to Ferdinand Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 10344 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of Payment by Bonds.
